Name: Statue of a Satyr
Description: This statue depicts a Satyr, a deity in Greek mythology. The standing man is shown naked, with his right hand holding attributes in front of his chest, and looking down to his left. His ears are pointed and his hair is short and curly. There is a groove on the back of his head to hold a diadem, or crown. The statue includes traces of an object against his left thigh, perhaps a tree stump on which he rested his left arm.
